TopicTitle: [1.9.x] EvaFuel Continued. No more infinite EVA Fuel!

Articles.Content:
4 hours ago, therealcrow999 said:

Is this still needed in KSP? I just came back to playing and wondering if vanilla KSP added this feature

Read the posts above. In 1.11 Squad added something for the modding community to prevent fuel resplenishing and "letting mods decide". Unfortunately since the EVA logic changed in 1.11 this mod doesn't work anymore...

16 hours ago, Goufalite said:

Read the posts above. In 1.11 Squad added something for the modding community to prevent fuel resplenishing and "letting mods decide". Unfortunately since the EVA logic changed in 1.11 this mod doesn't work anymore...

OK, thanks. For some reason I thought Squad added in the function at some point.
